        public void updateCompany(Company company)
                   throws CouponException
        Update Company (without company name)
        Parameters:
        company - Company
        Throws:
        CouponException - Company must include same unique name and filled password. Include double check to eliminate updating the company name, since the Company object does not pass the name anyway and the sql Update query does not include the company name.

      • getAllCoupons

        public java.util.Set<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
                                    throws CouponException
        View All Coupons in the system.
        Returns:
        Coupon collection
        Throws:
        CouponException - True = also expired This Coupon list important to administrator for support. For Administrator or support. (Not In Use Yet) If company Id, customerId and couponId are all 0 than all companies will be pooled. true - Include expired coupons - all coupons in Coupon table (for administrator only)
